plot: Two men arrive in a truck at an anonymous Moroccan village. They roam the town with shotguns, shooting stray dogs. A homeless man tries to keep his 'pet' dog safe from them.
title: Chiens errants
plot_es: Two men arrive in a truck at an anonymous Moroccan village. They roam the town with shotguns, shooting stray dogs. A homeless man tries to keep his 'pet' dog safe from them.
plot_en: Two men arrive in a truck at an anonymous Moroccan village. They roam the town with shotguns, shooting stray dogs. A homeless man tries to keep his 'pet' dog safe from them.
